title: e.l.f. Studio Mineral Infused Face Primer
description: Transform your face into a flawless and smooth canvas with the Mineral Infused Face Primer. Developed to combat against excess oil, flaky dryness, enlarged pores and fine lines. This clear multipurpose skin primer will prepare your skin so makeup goes on evenly for a long lasting satin finish.

title: Murad AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser, Step 1 Cleanse/Tone, 6.75 fl oz (200 ml)
description: Balances oily and dry zones to improve texture and reveal healthy-looking skin. Cleanses and Refines Skin By: Polishing away dullness and dehydration. Improving texture and tone. Intensive, exfoliating cleanser revitalizes skin or a healthy glow. Salicylic, Lactic and Glycolic Acids dissolve dull, dry surface cells. Jojoba Beads and Sodium PCA leave skin smooth and hydrated. Dermatologist developed and tested. Murad does not test on animals. Made in the USA.

title: ClearZine (2 Bottles) - The Top Rated Acne Treatment Pill. Eliminates Blotchiness, Redness, Blackheads and Zits,Each bottle contains 60 capsules
description:
Clearzine is the leading oral formula for the treatment of light to severe acne. This formula not only eliminates and prevents body and facial acne but supports healthy, youthful skin. Utilizing a Clinically Proven formula made up of only the most high quality ingredients known for their powerful skin clarifying and clearing abilities. 
Acne, zits, blemishes, infected pustules and blackheads are all problems that start far below the surface of your skin. Most so-called cures try to solve acne from outside using harmful chemicals and skin-stripping acids that can often make the problem worse. Clearzine does not try to solve the problem by scratching the surface; It goes to the root of the problem and attacks acne where it begins.

title: Snooki Ultra Dark Leg Bronzer w/ Hair Growth Inhibitors 6oz
description:
Make your legs red carpet worthy when you use Snooki's Ultra Dark Leg Bronzer. This blinged out bronzing formula is specially designed to dramatically darken those hard to tan areas. Enriched with skin firmers, shave minimizers and skin conditioners, this ultra dark formula leaves your legs feeling soft, smooth and incredibly sexy!

• Extra Dark Bronzers target those hard to tan areas for dramatically darker legs after UV exposure.
• HyperDark Tanning technology immediately prepares your skin for deep, rich golden color.
• Vitamin enriched skin conditioner blend helps skin fight against environmental stress for a more radiant and healthier looking glow.
• Advanced Skin Firming blend helps to smooth and improve skin's texture for a more toned and tightened appearance.
• SoftChic skin moisturizers with Coconut and Sweet Almond Oil hydrate skin leaving it feeling silky smooth and sexy.
• Paraben Free.

title: #1 BEST Vitamin C+E Serum Combination Antioxidant Treatment - 1 oz / 30 ml - Super Combination Antioxidant Formula - 15% Vitamin C, 1% Vitamin E, and 0.5% Ferulic acid.
description: Our Best Selling topical antioxidant Vitamin C+E Serum is  the highest-quality Vitamin C Serum available in today's cosmetic marketplace.Expected results are a significant improvement  in skin symptoms and conditions for a brighter, more radiant, even toned,  healthier and youthful looking complexion.Our Vitamin C+E Serum provides your skin with 3  potent antioxidants listed below:1. Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid):An active form of Vitamin C occurs naturally  in citrus fruits. This potent water-soluble antioxidant protects skin from  oxidative damages caused by the sun rays (UVA/UVB radiation). It improves  elasticity of skin by enhancing the production of collagen. Helps diminish  hyperpigmentation, erythma, and skin redness. Helps render vitamin E more  powerful.2. Ferulic Acid:A powerful antioxidant found in the cell  walls of plants. This ingredient is predominantly effective at preventing sun  damage. Research studies demonstrate exposure to ultraviolet light actually  increases the antioxidant capacity and efficacy of ferulic acid. Blended  synergistically with other antioxidants, ferulic acid renders vitamin C and  vitamin E more powerful then when used alone. Natural preventative capabilities  of ferulic acid prevent premature signs of photo-aging.3. Vitamin E (Alpha-Tocopherol):This antioxidant functions to protect against the harmful  effects of sun rays (UVA/UVB radiation) and reactive oxygen radicals.4. Hyaluronic  Acid:A  naturally occurring polysaccharide responsible for tissue hydration and  lubrication within the extra-cellular space of bodily tissues.

title: NuElle Triple Action Anti Cellulite Concentrate, 5oz
description: Our fabulous creation NuElle contains a cocktail of 25 well known flub busters that assist in weight loss and cellulite reduction, like caffeine, L'Carnitine, Butcher's Broom, Bladderwrack, Ivy and many others. Formulated to work both on the surface and in depth, this revolutionary treatment has multiple performance that can be seen with the naked eye within 2-3 weeks. Firming on the surface, detoxifying on the inside, reducing water retention and fat cell clusters, while improving circulation and overall appearance of the skin. Directions: Apply in circular motions twice a day, on all affected areas, specially on thighs, buttocks, stomach - to help to reduce the appearance of cellulite. (Preferably two hours after eating or one hour before meal. Your body will only burn fat when it has none in the bloodstream.) This product creates slight "sauna" effect that may cause you to sweat more on the areas where the product was applied. Warning: Use only as directed. Do not ingest. Keep out of reach of children. Due to diuretic effect this product may cause, we do not recommend this product for use while pregnant. For best resits we suggest to use it with our L'or de la Mer Organic Anti Cellulite Body Blaster Scrub with Seaweed and Phat QR Body Massager.

title: Fake Bake Flawless, 6-Ounce
description: Fake Bake Flawless Self-Tan Liquid combines ease of application with intense professional colour development. Flawless is applied with a professional mitt (included) in effortless gliding strokes for a perfectly even tan. The dual function cosmetic bronzer assists in making the application even easier (shows-where-it-goes) whilst providing an instant golden tan. The fast drying, fast absorbing formula is transfer resistant, so can be worn throughout the day. Formulated with Fake Bake's exclusive triple tan formula (DHA boosted by DMI & Erythulose) for an intense tan that lasts longer. Suitable for all skin tones and skin types. Pleasantly fragranced with a tropical scent. No artificial preservatives or Parabens.

title: Queen's Beauty Cream - Royal jelly face cream by Durham's Bee Farm
description: Durham's Queen's Beauty Cream is made with Royal Jelly. Prolong your natural beauty with this nourishing moisturizer specially formulated for sensitive and delicate skin. Give your dry, aging skin the royal treatment - our Queen's Beauty Cream with precious royal jelly. Increase moisture retention while protecting against environmental pollutants. Dermatologists worldwide agree that substances known as free radicals, composed of highly reactive oxygen molecules, are a major cause of skin aging. Over time they damage and dull the skin. Our Queen's Beauty Cream with royal jelly will increase cell renewal and rejuvenation improving the appearance as it minimizes fine lines and wrinkles. As it softens and moisturizes, you'll get a radiant, healthy, glowing, younger looking complexion.
